summary: Customer wants to migrate ERP and analytics to AWS within two quarters, with security and EU data residency as gating items.

customer_objectives: Migrate core ERP and analytics workloads to AWS within two quarters
requirements: EU data residency support for EU customers

customer_actions: Loop in security lead next week
open_questions: Which specific ERP and analytics components are in scope for phase 1?
What are the top security controls required for approval?
risks: Security review may delay timeline if requirements are not met
EU data residency constraints may limit architecture options

payload.message: Meeting recap . Acme wants ERP+analytics migration to AWS in 2 quarters. Success: -40% batch time, fewer outages. Gating: SSO, encryption at rest, EU data residency. Decision: Maya owns technical eval, CIO approves, Procurement runs paper. Next steps: we send migration plan + estimate, confirm EU residency. Security review next Tue. Proposal due Jan 10.

fields.Next_Step__c: Send migration plan + estimate. Confirm EU residency support. Schedule security review.
fields.Risks__c: Security and EU data residency are gating items.
fields.Close_Plan__c: Proposal by Jan 10. Security review next Tue. Pilot target Feb.
